item.title: Optimizing Docker Images Size
item.description: When you try to optimize the size of an image it is possible to display the size of every layers : docker history <image-id> For example : (ins)❯ docker history 7383c266ef25 IMAGE CREATED CREATED BY SIZE COMMENT 7383c266ef25 12 days ago CMD ["nginx" "-g" "daemon off;"] 0B buildkit.dockerfile.v0 <missing> 12 days ago STOPSIGNAL SIGQUIT 0B buildkit.dockerfile.v0 <missing> 12 days ago EXPOSE map[80/tcp:{}] 0B buildkit.dockerfile.v0 <missing> 12 days ago ENTRYPOINT ["/docker-entrypoint.sh"] 0B buildkit.
